thread.section_title: SaveOnLens Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SaveOnLens | saveonlens.com
thread.title: DQ

author: DQ
title: DQ
text:
I've purchased my AcuView Oasys contact lenses from SaveOnLense for a few years now. Their prices are competitive and they ship very fast. I can get them faster than my local offices and drug stores.
For this latest order, I wanted some spare lenses for an international trip in 2 days. Paid the next day shipping and they were at my door the next day which was a day earlier than expected. Always packaged well and fast!
I've told all of my friends about them and I am a referral from a family member that is happy with them
